title: Stuck at exactly 60fps, vsync off, anti-aliasing off, vsync disabled in NVIDEA
body: Hello boards. I don't know if this is the right place to submit this, but recently I've been stuck at exactly 60fps in league of legends. My laptop used to get 100-150+ a few weeks ago, and it's not like the specs are subpar. i7 5500-u processor and an nvidea 840m.. 8GB ram the computer supports higher fps for sure, but I can't access it :/ if anyone from riot, or anyone with a similar problem could help walk me through this that would be great :(

replies.body: There was a batch of windows updates that came out that enabled some Xbox game DVR settings by default. You can either disable the game bar or just DVR with [this guide](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) to see if anything changes. Let me know if this helped!

Is there anything I can do that would help you get a raise?

... no seriously I'm gonna file a ticket that says "'Targon's Blade' saw my post on the boards, got back to me despite it being 3AM, and fixed my problem for me. Please give this guy a raise"


Back to 120-170 FPS
Thanks man :)

EDIT: I hope you don't get in trouble for [this](http://imgur.com/a/RZhvk)
I LOVE YOU !!!!
Thank you so much. Was fiddling with my graphics settings for an hour.

dosent work for me
 i had 300 fps and now capped at 60 with uncapped settings
i have disabled dvr and updated drivers
with no results

if i cant get it back up there im quitting league
You're a god
Thank you very much! :)
God bless you, Sir!
Thank you very much! I've been having trouble with this problem for 2 months now!
Thankyou boss. My fps is fixed now <3
That one worked for me aswell! Thank you!

Here we are two months later and this solves my issue that just started today for 0 reason..... also fixed this dumb ass bug that because i have a 4k monitor ANY GAME i play launches windowed, i have to alt tab out/back in to fix it, and this windows update was the source... ive been dealing with that in particular for over a month now.. holy shit i am beyond thankful for finding this
Did you enable a framerate cap? Check if it's set to Uncapped in League of Legends.
Framerate is uncapped. Just disabled windows game DVR settings like the rioter said... however the server is down so I can't test it {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
switch to borderless i have 300 fps with that but 60 with fullscreen

You can go to your league folder 
Right click on client > properties
Then you go to compatibility tab and there will be *disable fullscreen optimization* 
You should tick it. That's the fix for you brother!
Bro you are a god , like i have been stuck with 60 fps in all games for like 3 months and this not only fixed it for lol but to all other games . thanks man <3
Omfg, do u realize how much i love u. xD went from 60 to 120 {{sticker:sg-jinx}}
Thanks it solved my problem sayajin goddo !
this still isn't working, any ideas?
I had this issue as well where it would get stuck at exactly 60 fps but i fixed it by updating my Nvidia so that might be worth a try for someone who is stuck at 60 fps.
Thanks a lot! Saved me some time : )
You sir. Targon you need a raise. thanks for the help.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
THANK YOU!
